text: Ni apeleche soni Allah chilandanyo (chine) chawandu wawili. Jumo mwa wawilio bubu, jwangalikombolela pachilichose, soni jwalakwe jugambile kuwa nsigo wakwasitopesya abwana wakwe, kulikose kuchannungamisye jwangaujako ni yambone (achi ni chilandanyo cha kafili). Ana mpaka alandane jwalakweju ni ajula jwaakulamula mwa chilungamiko, soni jwalakwe ali petala lyagoloka (jwali Nsilamu)
